trans-unit.source: Describes a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects that is attached to a single binding target property, which receives its value from the first binding in the collection that produces a value successfully.
trans-unit.target: 描述的集合， <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref>附加到单个绑定目标属性，它从成功生成值的集合中第一个绑定接收其值的对象。

trans-unit.source: PriorityBinding lets you associate a binding target (target) property with a list of bindings.
trans-unit.target: PriorityBinding，可以将绑定目标 （目标） 属性的绑定的列表与相关联。

trans-unit.source: The first binding that returns a value successfully becomes the active binding.
trans-unit.target: 已成功返回一个值的第一个绑定将成为活动的绑定。

trans-unit.source: A binding returns a value successfully if: 1.
trans-unit.target: 绑定返回一个值成功如果︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: The path to the binding source resolves successfully.
trans-unit.target: 已成功解析到绑定源的路径。

trans-unit.source: The value converter, if any, is able to convert the resulting value.
trans-unit.target: 值转换器，如果有的话，就能够将转换生成的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting value is valid for the target property.
trans-unit.target: 生成的值是有效的目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The value <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> is not considered a successful return value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>不被视为成功的返回值。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The priority of the bindings is determined by their order in the list.
trans-unit.target: 按其在列表中的顺序确定绑定的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The binding that appears first in the list has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: 将显示在列表前面所绑定的最高优先级。

trans-unit.source: The binding engine starts with the first binding in the list and verifies whether that binding returns a value successfully; if it does, the value from that binding is used.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引擎启动列表中的第一个绑定，并验证该绑定是否成功，则返回一个值如果存在，则使用该绑定中的值。

trans-unit.source: If the first binding does not return a value successfully, the binding engine examines the second binding to determine whether it returns a value successfully; if it does, the value from the second binding becomes the active value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个绑定不成功返回一个值，绑定引擎将检查以确定是否它返回一个值成功，则第二个绑定如果是这样，从第二个绑定的值将成为活动值的值。

trans-unit.source: This verification process continues to the end of the list of bindings.
trans-unit.target: 此验证过程将继续到的绑定列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings returns a value successfully, the binding uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 绑定的绑定都成功返回一个值，如果使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine continues to listen for changes on all bindings.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引擎将继续侦听的所有绑定的更改。

trans-unit.source: If at any point one of the bindings that has a higher priority returns a value successfully, the value for that binding becomes the active value and replaces the current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在任何点具有高的优先级的绑定之一返回一个值成功，该绑定的值将为活动值的值，并且替换当前值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects that is established for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>建立的此实例的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the collection syntax that is shown in the following example, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as Add.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 此属性仅在中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过使用以下示例所示的集合语法或访问的集合对象，并使用它的各种方法，例如 Add。

trans-unit.source: The property that you use to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read/write.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的集合对象的属性是只读的而集合本身是可读/写。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *OneOrMoreBindings* One or more objects; does not currently support or objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*OneOrMoreBindings*一个或多个对象;当前不支持或对象。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> currently supports only objects of type <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> and not <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>当前支持仅类型的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>和 not <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> child to a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> object implicitly adds the child to the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref> collection for the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>子级到<xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>对象会隐式添加到子<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingBase"></xref>集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化进程是否应序列化<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*>此类的实例上的属性</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*>的有效值

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*>属性值应序列化; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding.Bindings*>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的字符串。
